title: Medieval Dungeon Adventure #5
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Dark Dungeon Cell
rooms.description: A cold, damp cell deep beneath the castle. Water drips from the stone ceiling, and rats scurry in the shadows. Iron bars block the window, allowing only a sliver of moonlight to enter. The air smells of mold and despair. A skeleton lies slumped in the corner, and a heavy wooden door is the only exit.

items.name: prisoner's skeleton
items.description: The remains of a previous prisoner, still wearing tattered clothes

items.name: prisoner's journal
items.description: A small, water-damaged book clutched in the skeleton's bony hand
items.text: Day 127: I have been here so long I've lost hope. This cursed dungeon was built in 1342 by the cruel Sir Blackwood. They say the treasure vault holds the key to freedom, but I'll never see it. The combination to my chest is the year this prison was born.

items.name: loose stone in wall
items.description: A stone in the wall that appears slightly out of place

items.name: rusty iron key
items.description: An old key hidden behind the loose stone, covered in rust

items.name: old wooden chest
items.description: A chest in the corner with a combination lock showing four rotating number wheels

items.name: guard's uniform
items.description: A stolen guard uniform, useful for blending in

items.name: escape plan note
items.description: A note written by the previous prisoner
items.text: If you're reading this, I'm already dead. To escape, you must reach the treasure vault. The guards keep records in their room - learn the dungeon master's name, where they take the condemned, and remember who you truly are. Only then can you pass through the vault door.

items.name: heavy cell door
items.description: A thick wooden door reinforced with iron bands. A rusty lock secures it.

rooms.name: Guard Room
rooms.description: A dimly lit room where guards take their rest. Torches flicker on the walls, casting dancing shadows. A wooden table is covered with dice and playing cards. Wanted posters and duty rosters hang on the walls. A massive iron door to the east leads to the treasure vault.

items.name: wanted poster for Red Hand Tom
items.description: A poster showing a notorious thief
items.text: WANTED: Red Hand Tom - Theft, Burglary. Last seen near the gallows. REWARD: 50 gold pieces

items.name: wanted poster for Black Knife Mary
items.description: A poster depicting a dangerous criminal
items.text: WANTED: Black Knife Mary - Murder, Assault. Sentenced to the gallows. REWARD: 100 gold pieces

items.name: guard duty roster
items.description: A schedule posted on the wall
items.text: GUARD DUTY ROSTER - All guards report to Sir Blackwood, Dungeon Master. Night shift: Check all cells. Morning shift: Escort condemned prisoners to the gallows. Remember: Only knights of the realm are held in the high-security cells.

items.name: guard's desk
items.description: A sturdy oak desk with three drawers and various papers scattered on top

items.name: dungeon master's log
items.description: A leather-bound book with daily entries
items.text: Entry 47: Another knight captured trying to overthrow the king. These noble fools never learn. The middle drawer combination is the reward for Black Knife Mary. We must maintain order in Sir Blackwood's dungeon.

items.name: silver vault key
items.description: A polished silver key with intricate engravings

items.name: weapon rack
items.description: A rack holding swords and shields

items.name: lit torch
items.description: A burning torch that provides light

items.name: iron vault door
items.description: A massive iron door with elaborate locks. Three questions are engraved on a brass plate beside it.

password_questions.question: Who is the master of this dungeon?
password_questions.hint: Check the duty roster and the dungeon log

password_questions.question: Where are the condemned taken?
password_questions.hint: Read the wanted posters and duty roster carefully

password_questions.question: What is your true identity?
password_questions.hint: The duty roster mentions who is held in high-security cells

rooms.name: Royal Treasure Vault
rooms.description: You've made it! A magnificent chamber filled with chests overflowing with gold coins, jeweled crowns, and precious artifacts. Torches illuminate piles of treasure collected over centuries. At the far end, a secret passage leads up a spiral staircase to freedom. Fresh air flows down from above.

items.name: chests of gold
items.description: Multiple chests filled with gold coins and precious gems

items.name: jeweled crown
items.description: A magnificent crown encrusted with rubies and diamonds

items.name: secret passage
items.description: A hidden staircase leading up to freedom
items.text: Stone steps wind upward, and you can see daylight at the top. Freedom awaits!

rooms.win_message: You've escaped the dungeon with your freedom and discovered the royal treasure! As you climb the secret passage, you emerge in the forest outside the castle walls. The fresh air fills your lungs as you leave your imprisonment behind forever. You win!
